channel.title: Panning for Pity
channel.description:
I know some of you may think of me as an insensitive jerk for saying this but you have every right to.
Lately I've been seeing a flood of sympathy threads, the latest one being this:
http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php/topic,28642.0.html
I've seen others like Pray for Irfan and other threads claiming some personal tragedy has happened and they want attention and sympathy for everyone. I have a feeling all of this is bullshit made up by certain people to get some attention and or score some pity so that people would be more lenient to the person. These are my thoughts, and I didn't want to post in regular section since I didn't want to invoke a mob war against me :rolleyes:
Your Thoughts.

item.title: Panning for Pity
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:59, topic:18902”][quote author=VG_Kobra link=topic=28657.msg379537#msg379537 date=1162331799]

hmmm

Im not sure if this is all considered spam or not

I wonder as well if this is considered spam, lets make multiple more replies discussing how to classify spam.
[/quote]
they say its edible but not suggested[/quote]

Hmmm kinda like MSG? I heard that its made from Turkey necks, hearts and genitals, personally I don’t mind spending 3 extra cents to get Spam Deluxe. They upgraded it to Turkey brains and butt.

5p4m 4 1yf3!

Read full topic

item.title: Panning for Pity
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Another noob just made on of these retarded threads. That haxxorz guy or whatever the fuck his name is.

I know I made a thread before, but that was before this was a problem. And on my return I didn’t realise how bad it was getting. But I propose that there really should be a rule about this, or an airport forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Panning for Pity
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:53, topic:18902”]i [quote author=VG_Kobra link=topic=28657.msg371103#msg371103 date=1162169570]

[quote]#icare

p.s. I don’t give a fuck what noobs think, they are worthless.[/quote]


Right… and who do you see as a noob?
You were a noob once. Noob is someone who doesn’t bother reading shit before they ask about it.
And i’m 100% sure that about 98% of the community are or have been like this.

Well I guess that means 98% of the Community is worthless

fixed.

I was a noob for about a week, or less.

VG was never a noob, I love him for it.

Gasp She loves me! Blushes Prances around room

[innocent]So umm Bebe, do you have any plans for your weekend? :)[/innocent]

Actually I do, sleep and school work, wanna join

I will be more than glad to help you out with Sleep

Schoolwork…hmm…Can I take a raincheck on that?

LOLz, it’ll be the only time you could sleep with me

What ev, your useless, no help with homework!

[me=Bebemycat2]walks away[/me]

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

[me=VG_Kobra]grows a beard, starts drinking (even more than before) whilst sad violin music plays in the background, and might suicide if he has the balls to.[/me]

You forgot sitting by a dimly light fire and crying.

Oh yeah.

[me=VG_Kobra]its by a dimly lit fire with his booze and starts crying, then he notices his tattered clothes catch fire and he burns into ashes. Then in heaven he finds out a cheapskate Jew found about his tragic story and made into a film that won 11 Oscars and made him a billionaire. Then he tries to suicide in heaven but he couldn’t b/c he is already dead. So he starts crying in heaven and then god comes to console him, then he kicks God in his balls and takes his halo and become king of the world. Then he takes control of Bebe and makes her become his Sex Slave.[/me]

How stupid of me not to add that before
[/quote]
[me=VG_Kobra]realizes bebe is actually a guy, decides to become a lady of the streets[/me][/quote]
roflcopter!

Pimp war, lolz

Read full topic
